eu_initiatives:
- Energy policies, legistlation and regulation 
- Initiatives, legistlation and regulation related to nuclear power
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: TVO interacts with various energy sector organizations, especially those dedicated for nuclear power. These organizations include eg: Foratom, Euratom, European Nuclear Society, European Nuclear Council, European Nuclear Energy Forum
relevant_communication:
- Information sharing and discussions about the situation and future of nuclear power industry. 
- Influencing via associations related to nuclear power such as Foratom.
goals__remit: Teollisuuden Voima Oyj (TVO) is a Finnish nuclear power company which owns and operates Olkiluoto power plant where it produces electricity at cost price to its shareholders, Finnish industrial and energy companies.
